rules.title: The rules of Njata:
rules.content:
1) Use in character channels like Say and Whisper for in
   character communication, and out of character channels
   like Tell, Ask, Answer and Chat for out of character
   conversations. When in doubt, ask an Immortal!

2) You are responsible for anything your character does.
   The excuse "But someone else was playing my character"
   is not an acceptable one.

3) No botting whatsoever. In addition to violating any
   of our attempts here at immersion, this also leads to
   griefing other people who are actually -playing- their
   character.

4) Multiplying is allowed, but only so long as your
   characters aren't PVP flagged. Exceptions will be made
   for multiple players playing on the same LAN, of course.

5) Don't advertise other muds or post offensive links in
   public areas. If you're unsure about what's offensive,
   don't post it!

6) Please don't harass others. We have a zero tolerance
   policy for griefers, and will come down hard on anyone
   doing it to others.
